synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The reaction afforded three mesoporous MOFs with corundum-type frameworks and hierarchical pore sizes.

chemicals_used: nitrate salts of Eu3+ or Tb3+
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The successful Ln3+ loading does not influence the crystalline integrity of 1, as demonstrated by PXRD profiles.

chemicals_used: nitrate salts of Eu3+ and Tb3+
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The co-doped MOF displayed bimodal luminescence and the Eu3+/Tb3+ percentage-tuned intermediate colors of the doped MOF samples can also be observed by naked eye.
